title: Hubert Jocham summertime discounts
content:
Submitted by [Miss Tiffany](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829132408/http:/typophile.com/user/108 "View user profile.") : 20.Jun.2008 9.04am 

Hubert Jocham Type, Summer Discount  
minus 20 Euro per font

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829132408im_/http:/typophile.com/files/big-discount_5026.jpeg)

Over the summer every few days one of my typefaces will have a price drop  
of 20 Euro per single font (approx. 30 USD). The prices will stay low till autumn.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829132408im_/http:/typophile.com/files/little-discount_4212.jpeg)

Summer Discount will start right now with NewLibris.  
 [http://www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/sans/NewLibris/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080829132408/http:/www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/sans/NewLibris/ "http://www.hubertjocham.de/item.php/type/sans/NewLibris/")
author: Miss Tiffany
